item.title: Samsung S25 series key specs and new software features leaked online - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Samsung S25 series key specs and new software features leaked online

Date: January 16, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

Samsung is set to launch its new Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, showcasing advanced AI features aimed at enhancing user experience.

  • The Galaxy S25 is billed as a 'True AI Companion'.
  • Features like restaurant information and calendar management through a dedicated chatbot are introduced.
  • New 'Sketch to Image' functionality will allow users to sketch an object and transform it using AI.

item.title: 32-inch smart TVs available at massive discount during Republic Day sale, starting from just Rs 7,000 - India TV News
item.description:
Massive Discounts on 32-Inch Smart TVs During Republic Day Sale Starting at Rs 7,000

Publication Date: January 2025 Source: India TV News

E-commerce giant Amazon is hosting a Republic Day sale with substantial discounts on various smart TVs, making it the perfect time to purchase a new one.

  • 32-inch smart TVs are available starting from Rs 7,000.
  • Discounts of up to 61% on select models, along with no-cost EMI options, bank offers, and exchange deals.
  • The Xiaomi Smart TV A is discounted from Rs 24,999 to Rs 11,999, featuring a 20-watt sound output.
  • The VW 32-inch Playwall is notably priced around Rs 6,000 to Rs 7,000 with a 59% discount.
  • TCL's 32-inch model originally priced at Rs 21,990 is now available for Rs 10,990.
  • Another VW model is discounted from Rs 22,999 to Rs 8,999 with a 61% discount.
  • Acer's QLED TV is down from Rs 24,999 to Rs 12,499, featuring a 30-watt sound output.
“This Republic Day Sale offers customers a chance to save significantly on popular brands like Samsung, TCL, Sony, Xiaomi, and more,” said an Amazon spokesperson.

The Republic Day Sale presents an excellent opportunity for television shoppers looking for budget-friendly options and great features.

item.title: Nintendo unveils Switch 2, its new hybrid console - The Indian Express
item.description:
Nintendo Launches Switch 2, Aims to Broaden Gaming Audience

Date: January 16, 2025 Source: Indian Express

Nintendo has unveiled the Switch 2, its next-generation console, designed to attract a wider audience beyond traditional gamers. This launch is set to follow the highly successful original Switch from 2017.

  • The Switch 2 features a familiar design but is larger with black Joy-Con controllers that attach magnetically.
  • A new home button and USB-C port have been introduced, along with a revised kickstand and dock design.
  • The console supports backwards compatibility with many existing Nintendo Switch games, though some may have compatibility issues.
  • Nintendo plans to share additional details during a Nintendo Direct event on April 2, 2025.
  • The strategy resembles Apple's approach to hardware updates, focusing on an iterative improvement of the existing platform.
  • Nintendo has aspirations to broaden its brand presence beyond gaming, similar to how Apple expanded with the iPhone.
Nintendo's success now relies on continuing the legacy of the highly popular original Switch while simultaneously appealing to a new audience.

Nintendo's evolution from a traditional gaming company to a broader entertainment enterprise mirrors trends seen in companies like Disney and Apple, promoting an overall brand experience over just gaming.

item.title: Realme 14 Pro 5G and 14 Pro+ 5G launched in India: See price, colour-changing feature, specs, details - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Realme 14 Pro 5G and 14 Pro+ 5G launched in India: See price, colour-changing feature, specs, details

Date: January 16, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Realme has introduced its landmark 14 Pro series, featuring the world's first colour-changing smartphone, which changes from Pearl White to Vibrant Blue when temperatures drop below 16°C.

  • The series includes Realme 14 Pro 5G and Realme 14 Pro+ 5G.
  • Realme 14 Pro+ features a 6.83-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 7s Gen 3, and a 50 MP main camera.
  • Realme 14 Pro has a 6.77-inch display, MediaTek Dimensity 7300, and a 50 MP main camera.
  • Pricing starts at ₹24,999 for the 14 Pro and ₹29,999 for the 14 Pro+.
  • Other products launched include Realme Buds wireless 5 ANC.
“Realme claims to be the world’s first cold-sensitive and colour-changing smartphone, developed in collaboration with Nordic design studio Valeur Designers.”

These new phones and accessories will be available for purchase from January 23 on Flipkart and official stores.

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 announcement: all the news on the next console - The Verge
item.description:
Nintendo Switch 2 Announcement: All the Latest Details

Updated Today, Jan 16, 2025, 2:02 PM UTC by Andrew Webster

Nintendo has shared the first details about the Nintendo Switch 2 in a recently published video, but does not specify the exact release date beyond “2025.” The new console resembles the original but is larger, featuring revamped Joy-Con controllers that attach magnetically.

  • Nintendo revealed the Switch 2 in a video shared online.
  • The release is anticipated in 2025, but no specific date has been given.
  • Joy-Con controllers now attach magnetically and come in black with colored accents.
  • A Switch 2 Direct is scheduled for April 2nd, which will likely provide more information about games and features.
  • Speculation includes a new Mario Kart game as a possible launch title.
“Now that Nintendo’s reveal of the Switch 2 has put to rest years of anticipation and rumormongering.”

The anticipation surrounding the Nintendo Switch 2 continues to grow as the company prepares for its upcoming Direct in April.

item.title: Realme 14 Pro Plus with triple flash and colour changing back panel now available in India - The Indian Express
item.description:
Realme 14 Pro Plus with triple flash and colour changing back panel now available in India

Date: January 16, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

The Realme 14 Pro Plus has debuted as the world's first Android phone featuring a triple flash and a temperature-sensitive colour-changing back panel.

  • Powered by Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chipset and runs on Realme UI 6.0 based on Android 15.
  • The device boasts a 6.83-inch OLED display with 120Hz refresh rate and a peak brightness of 1,500 nits.
  • Features IP68 and IP69 dust and water resistance for enhanced durability.
  • Distinctive Pearl White variant changes color based on temperature due to thermochromic pigments.
  • Equipped with a triple camera setup including two 50MP sensors and an 8MP ultrawide camera.
  • Offers a 6,000mAh battery with 80W fast charging support.
  • Available in two configurations: 8GB RAM/128GB storage at Rs 29,999 and 12GB RAM/256GB storage at Rs 34,999 with additional discounts.
“The back has thermochromic pigments, which starts out as white but turns blue when the temperature drops below 16 degrees Celsius.”

The Realme 14 Pro Plus represents an innovative addition to the smartphone market with its unique temperature-sensitive design and competitive specifications.

item.title: Republic Day offer: iPhone 14 on EMI with affordable down payment on Flipkart - Mint
item.description:
iPhone 14 Available on Easy EMI During Flipkart Republic Day Sale

Publication Date: January 2023   |   Source: Mint

The Flipkart Republic Day Sale offers an opportunity to purchase the iPhone 14 with minimal down payments and affordable EMI options through the Bajaj Finserv Insta EMI Card.

This year’s Republic Day Sale is set to transform consumers' shopping experiences, making premium products more accessible.

  • Exclusive offers on the iPhone 14 series during Flipkart's biggest sale of the year.
  • The Bajaj Finserv Insta EMI Card allows for high-value purchases with low monthly instalments.
  • Pre-qualified loan amounts of up to Rs. 3 lakh enable consumers to buy additional products without financial burden.
  • Flexible repayment options from 1 to 60 months cater to different financial situations.
  • Zero foreclosure charges offer complete financial freedom for early payoffs.
“Make this Republic Day memorable with your new iPhone 14.”

Take advantage of special benefits and ensure a seamless shopping experience during the Flipkart Republic Day Sale.

item.title: NVIDIA admits RTX 5070 no match for RTX 4090 without DLSS - The Indian Express
item.description:
NVIDIA admits RTX 5070 no match for RTX 4090 without DLSS

Date: January 16, 2025
Source: Indian Express

NVIDIA recently unveiled its latest graphics card series at CES 2025, highlighting its RTX 50-series models. While the RTX 5070 is marketed as capable of RTX 4090-like performance, the company admits that this is dependent on its DLSS technology.

  • The RTX 50-series includes the RTX 5070, 5070Ti, 5080, and 5090, starting at Rs 59,000.
  • NVIDIA claims the RTX 5070 can offer comparable performance to the RTX 4090, priced at Rs 1,58,000.
  • Benchmarks indicate the RTX 5070 is about 20% faster than the RTX 4070 without DLSS.
  • However, performance drops significantly in ray-tracing scenarios without DLSS support.
NVIDIA’s claim that the RTX 5070 offers RTX 4090-like performance falls completely flat without DLSS.

The unveiling raises questions about the true performance of the RTX 5070 and its value in the context of NVIDIA's higher-end offerings.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 dummy unit emerges in live images - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
item.description:
iPhone SE 4 dummy unit emerges in live images

Publication Date: Not specified Source: GSM Arena

Rumors about the upcoming fourth-generation iPhone SE have been ongoing, with an expected announcement in April. Reliable source Sonny Dickson shared images of dummy units used for molding cases and accessories.

  • The dummy unit shows a single camera sensor, microphone cutout, and flat sides with volume buttons.
  • Expected features include a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display and a physical SIM tray.
  • The device may come with an updated Apple A18 chip, 8GB RAM, a 48MP camera, and a starting price of $499.
"Rumors also point to a USB-C port replacing the Lightning connector."

This upcoming budget iPhone is generating significant anticipation among consumers and tech enthusiasts.

item.title: 15+ Apple products coming in 2025: iPhone 17 Pro and iPad 11 to Apple Watch Ultra 3 - Check expected lineup - Hindustan Times
item.description:
15+ Apple products coming in 2025: iPhone 17 Pro and iPad 11 to Apple Watch Ultra 3 - Check expected lineup

Date: Jan 16, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

2025 is set to be a busy year for Apple, with numerous product launches anticipated based on recent reports.

  • iPad 11th Generation: Expected to feature the latest Apple AI enhancements.
  • iPad Air M4: May skip M3 and move directly to M4 chip.
  • iPhone SE 4: Likely release in March or April 2025.
  • MacBook Air M4: An upgrade to M4 chip expected.
  • AirTag 2: A new generation of AirTags coming.
  • Mac Studio M4: M4 chip expected for the Mac Studio lineup.
  • New Smart Display: A home display expected to control devices with Apple HomeKit.
  • Apple Watch Ultra 3: Next-generation Apple Watch likely to be unveiled.
  • iPhone 17 and iPhone 17 Air: Expected to come with the Apple A19 chip.
  • iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max: Major redesign and new Apple A19 Pro chipset anticipated.
  • Apple Watch SE 3: New entry-level watch model expected.
  • MacBook Pro with M5 Chip: An upgrade in performance expected with M5 chip.
  • Apple Watch Series 11: New features including blood pressure detection anticipated.
  • iPad Pro M5: Expected to feature the new M5 chipset.

Overall, 2025 is shaping up to be a dynamic year for Apple with significant upgrades and new product introductions on the horizon.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 key specs and AI features leaked online ahead of January 22 launch event - India Today
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Key Specs and AI Features Leak Ahead of January Launch

Published On: Jan 16, 2025

Source: Aman Rashid

The upcoming Samsung Galaxy S25 series is set to launch on January 22, 2025, with significant upgrades in camera technology and AI features.

  • The Galaxy S25 Ultra will feature a 200-megapixel primary camera and a 50-megapixel ultra-wide camera.
  • The series will include a 5,000 mAh battery in the Ultra model, offering up to 31 hours of video playback.
  • All models will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip with 12GB RAM.
  • New AI features will provide personalized daily summaries and integrate Google’s Gemini AI assistant for enhanced user interaction.
  • Camera improvements aim to address previous shortcomings, especially in ultra-wide photos.
"These updates give us an idea about the company’s seriousness when it comes to AI and camera enhancements."

This leak demonstrates Samsung's commitment to integrating advanced technology in its upcoming devices.

item.title: Samsung announces festive offers on Galaxy Z-series foldables: Check deals - Business Standard
item.description:
Samsung Announces Festive Offers on Galaxy Z-Series Foldables

Publication Date: January 2023
Source: Business Standard

Samsung has rolled out festive offers on its Galaxy Z-series foldable smartphones ahead of the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22.

  • Instant cashback on select bank cards
  • No-interest EMI options up to 24 months
  • Discounts on Galaxy Watch Ultra and Galaxy Buds 3 Pro
“Get Rs 18,000 off on the Galaxy Watch Ultra and Rs 7,000 off on the Galaxy Buds 3 Pro.”

These offers are aimed at encouraging purchases ahead of the new Galaxy S25 series unveiling.

item.title: Samsung drops Galaxy S24 Ultra price by a massive $500! - SamMobile - Samsung news
item.description:
Samsung Drops Galaxy S24 Ultra Price by $500

Date: January 16, 2025 | Source: Sammobile

Samsung has introduced a substantial discount for the Galaxy S24 Ultra as the launch of its upcoming Galaxy S25 series approaches. The flagship can now be purchased for as low as $799 without a trade-in.

  • The Galaxy S24 Ultra is now available for $799, $919, and $1,159 for the 256GB, 512GB, and 1TB models, respectively.
  • A $300 discount is offered with no trade-in, plus an additional $200 discount on online exclusive colors.
  • This $500 total discount applies to all three storage configurations.
  • Customers planning to buy the latest phone may consider waiting for the Galaxy S25 Ultra, set to release soon.
"If you're looking for a great value proposition for a powerful flagship phone, this Galaxy S24 Ultra deal is unbeatable."

This limited-time offer on the Galaxy S24 Ultra presents an exceptional deal for those seeking a high-performance smartphone.

item.title: Poco X7 goes on sale for Rs 21,999: Top 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skip - India Today
item.description:
Poco X7 goes on sale for Rs 21,999: Top 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skip

Published On: Jan 16, 2025 | Published By: Aman Rashid

The Poco X7 enters the budget smartphone market at Rs 21,999, offering solid performance and features. This article outlines the top four reasons to consider this phone and one reason to reconsider your purchase.

Poco X7 5G: 4 reasons to buy

  • Solid build with IP69 rating: Durable design with unique color and protection against dust and water.
  • Immersive multimedia experience: An AMOLED display with vibrant colors, 120Hz refresh rate, and excellent audio.
  • Good battery life: 5,500mAh battery lasting a full day with decent charging speeds.
  • Decent camera performance: 50MP main camera and good image quality in various lighting conditions.

Poco X7 5G: 1 reason to skip

Android 14: Ships with HyperOS on Android 14, while competitors get newer versions.

Despite its drawbacks, the Poco X7 is a competitively priced device suitable for everyday tasks.

item.title: Vivo T3 Pro and T3 Ultra receive official price cuts in India: Here are the new prices - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Vivo T3 Pro and T3 Ultra are now cheaper by ₹2,000. Here's what they cost now.

Date: Jan 16, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Vivo has announced a price drop for the Vivo T3 Ultra and T3 Pro, making these mid-range smartphones more affordable for consumers. This move comes ahead of competing launches from brands like Realme.

  • The Vivo T3 Pro now costs ₹22,999 for the 8GB + 128GB model, and ₹24,999 for the 8GB + 256GB model.
  • The Vivo T3 Ultra is priced at ₹29,999 for its entry-level variant and ₹33,999 for the top model.

Specifications and Features

Vivo T3 Ultra

Features a MediaTek Dimensity 9200+ chipset, 12GB RAM, 256GB storage, 6.78-inch AMOLED display, 5,500mAh battery, and a dual-camera setup.

Vivo T3 Pro

Powered by Snapdragon 7 Gen 3, available with up to 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, and includes similar display and battery specifications as the Ultra model.

item.title: Nothing raises funding, crosses $1 billion in lifetime sales - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Nothing Raises $100 Million in Funding, Surpasses $1 Billion in Sales

Publication Date: March 2024 | Source: CNBC TV18

Nothing, the smartphone startup backed by Google's venture arm, is set to raise at least $100 million in a new funding round while surpassing $1 billion in lifetime sales.

  • Founded in 2021, Nothing has rapidly gained popularity due to its unique smartphone designs.
  • The company aims to expand its operations and market reach, focusing on international growth.
  • Nothing's current largest markets include India, Germany, the UK, and the US.
  • In 2024, the company doubled its annual revenue to over $500 million.
  • It sold a total of 7 million units across its product lineup, including smartphones and audio devices.
“Nothing has told investors that its margins have improved from a year ago.”

In conclusion, Nothing continues to gain traction in the competitive smartphone market, showcasing significant growth and expansion plans for the future.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 dummy units leak, and it's giving 'Apple x Nexus 5' - Android Authority
item.description:
Leaked iPhone SE 4 Models Display New Design Resembling Nexus 5

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Android Authority

The leaker Sonny Dickson has provided images of iPhone SE 4 dummy models, showcasing a brand-new design and significant upgrades.

  • Photos of iPhone SE 4 dummy models reveal an all-new design replacing the classic chassis.
  • Available in white and black finishes, similar to previous iPhone models.
  • The rear camera design closely resembles that of the Google Nexus 5, suggesting a 48MP upgrade.
“The iPhone SE 4 — or iPhone 16E — will likely launch in March and maintain a sub-$500 price.”

The anticipated release of the iPhone SE 4 could challenge affordable Android phone markets with a modern design and enhanced features.

item.title: Amazon Republic Day Sale: Get iPhone 15, Honor 200, and more at up to 40% discount | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Amazon Republic Day Sale: Get iPhone 15, Honor 200, and More at Up to 40% Discount

Publication Date: January 2024 Source: Live Mint

Amazon is hosting its Great Republic Day Sale, offering huge discounts on popular smartphones including the iPhone 15 and Honor 200.

  • iPhone 15: Available at a 17% discount with additional bank and exchange offers.
  • Honor 200 5G: Originally priced at Rs.39999, now available for Rs.23998, a 40% discount.
  • OnePlus Nord 4: A 12% discount, originally Rs.32999, with bank offers.
  • Realme GT 7 Pro: Discounted to Rs.59998, offering a 14% savings.
  • iQOO 12 5G: Available at a 23% discount along with bank offers.

Looking to upgrade your smartphone? These models provide some of the best deals during the Amazon sale.

"Now is the perfect time for a smartphone upgrade as Amazon is hosting its awaited Great Republic Day Sale."

This sale makes it an excellent opportunity for buyers to purchase top-tier smartphones at significantly reduced prices.

item.title: Realme launches 14 Pro series smartphones in India: Check price, specs - Business Standard
item.description:
Realme Launches 14 Pro Series Smartphones in India: Pricing and Specs Revealed

Date: October 2023
Source: Tech News Daily

Chinese smartphone brand Realme has launched its 14 Pro series 5G smartphones in India, featuring innovative designs and powerful specifications.

  • The series includes the Realme 14 Pro Plus powered by Snapdragon 7s Gen three and the Realme 14 Pro with MediaTek Dimensity 7300.
  • Both models have a unique temperature-sensitive colour-changing design that reacts to cold.
  • Realme 14 Pro Plus prices start at Rs 29,999, while the 14 Pro starts at Rs 24,999.
  • Both devices feature 6000mAh batteries and are available for pre-booking with special launch offers.
“The Realme 14 Pro Plus is the first in its segment with a quad-curved display, showcasing our commitment to innovation.” - Realme Representative

The launch of the Realme 14 Pro series showcases the brand's focus on advanced technology and stylish designs, promising to capture the attention of smartphone enthusiasts in India.
